description: First differences of sequence of primorials.
comments: Largest number below primorial(n + 1) to be divisible by the first n primes. - _Alonso del Arte_, Dec 13 2014
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,100
prog: (PARI) { n=-1; r=q=1; forprime (p=2, prime(101), r*=p; write("b061720.txt", n++, " ", r-q); q=r ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 27 2009
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 20 2001
extensions: Since primorial(0) = 1, term a(0) = 1 added by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 27 2009
